help.description: Shows a list of commands you can use.

roulette.description: Creates a roulette, and play with it!

add.description: Adds an element to the roulette.

element.description: The name of the element to add.

remove.description: Removes the element from the roulette

element.description: The element of the element to remove.

random.description: Selects a random element from the roulette.

roulette.noElements: :x: There are no elements in the roulette.
roulette.proviceElementError: :x: Please provide a name for the element.
roulette.rouletteCreated: :white_check_mark: **Roulette created!** Use /roulette add to add a new item to the list.
roulette.elementNotFound: :x: The specified element is not found in the roulette.
roulette.rouletteCleared: `:white_check_mark: **Roulette cleared!** Use /roulette add to add a new item to the list.`

language.description: Set the language for the bot.

commands.anErrorOcurred: :x: An error occurred while processing your request.

noLevelExp: **You don't have any levels yet.** Chat a little more and try again.
targetNoLevelExp: `:x: <@\`${TARGET_USER_OBJECT.user.id}\`> **doesn't hace any levels yet.** Try again when they chat a little more.`
